toolkit:ToolkitErrorInfo.toolkit:ErrorText: The header 'someheader' from the namespace 'http://www.w3.org/2005/08/addressing' was not understood by the recipient of this message, causing the message to not be processed. This error typically indicates that the sender of this message has enabled a communication protocol that the receiver cannot process.
toolkit:ToolkitErrorInfo.toolkit:ErrorDiagnosticText: Please ensure that the configuration of the client's binding is consistent with the service's binding.
